authors: Chase me ladies, I'm the Cavalry

wikimedia-mwoauthserver-invalid-user: There was a problem with logging you in globally. If you just created your account, please log out and log back in, then try again to authorise the app. If you did not just create your account, please visit [https://meta.wikimedia.org/ meta.wikimedia.org] and then try again to authorise the app. (Error code: E008)
